info.description:

{ "title": "Introduction to Node.js and How Node.js works?", "description" : "Node.js is a popular framework for building backend systems (network applications) which can scale very well. Node.js is a Javascript runtime i.e. it runs the javascript codes.", "text": "

This will depend on how you render the blog. It can be html text or plain text.

", "blogUrl": "introduction-to-node-js-and-how-node-js-works-2", "imgUrl": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/janishar/onboarding-osb-node-typescript/master/addons/github_assets/cover-nodejs-backend.png", "score": 0.9, "tags" : ["NODEJS", "BACKEND"] }
